data.eml:eml: Two new species of frogs of the genus Pristimantis from Llanganates National Park in Ecuador with comments on the regional diversity of Ecuadorian Pristimantis (Anura, Craugastoridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Navarrete, Maria J., Venegas, Pablo J., Ron, Santiago R. (2016): Two new species of frogs of the genus Pristimantis from Llanganates National Park in Ecuador with comments on the regional diversity of Ecuadorian Pristimantis (Anura, Craugastoridae). ZooKeys 593: 139-162, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.593.8063, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.593.8063
